attributes.action: Deceiving the Electorate should immediately result in a General election.
attributes.additional_details:
This current Government has not only lied to the Electorate before election in their manifesto. They have continued to lie during their time in Parliament to justify unfair tax raises.
Voter confidence is at an all time low in our democracy, and this Government should be held accountable.
attributes.background: Call an immediate General Election due to proven deceit to the public, regarding a non existing "black hole" to justify exhorbarant tax rises.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept this petition as there is already a petition open on this topic:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050

You may also wish to sign this petition on a similar topic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744946
